snippet: Europe’s foreign policy chief, Catherine Ashton, on a visit to Kiev sought to play down expectations of a big windfall, saying money would be part of a broader assistance package.
lead_paragraph: Europe’s foreign policy chief, Catherine Ashton, on a visit to Kiev sought to play down expectations of a big windfall, saying money would be part of a broader assistance package.

headline.main: European Official Takes Measured Tone on Ukraine Aid
headline.print_headline: European Official Takes Measured Tone on Ukraine Aid
